column4: to enable me to use a usb-drive, i believe i have to edit /etc/fstab - however - i have no idea how to do this.  would someone be so kind as to point me in the correct direction please?
a usb drive should automount /media/<label of usb drive>
- i am not using Gnome, i am using kfce - should it stil automount?
though you might want to try out 'pmount'

syntax is pmount device [label]  it says in the manual - but i am so new to linux - that it still doesn't make too much sense to me.  firstly, what options do i need, secondly, what do i enter as "device"?
if you want someone to help, u need to give details of the wireless card etc
did u compile the drivers from source?
yes - i installed them just like https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Rt2500WirelessCardsHowTo?highlight=%28wireless%29 - but substituting 2500 for 2400
hmm...i was abt to suggest you to do that same thing...
i installed them ok - but when i tried to install raconfig - it didn't work
sorry abt that, got disconnected. is it okay for me to /msg you?
